item.title: Who am I?
item.description: Hi! My name is Tony Lijo Jose . I am an embedded systems engineer working in chennai . I am passionate about opensource , embedded systems and tons of other things . I enjoy writting code in c / c++ / python / java script . I use this blog to share some of my technical experiments with you .
